item.title: My dotfiles
item.description:
Yes, I finally setup my work environment to work across in my differents machines, I used this tools for that:

  • Tmux
  • Powerline fonts patched (I uploaded my fonts patched)
  • Iterm2 (v3.3)
  • NeoVim
  • Oh-My-Zsh
  • Spf13 vim configuration

Check out my public repo in that I wrote how to install if you want reuse my config.
